person.note: Zhao(1) Bian [375] His ancestors were the Xinan branch of the Tianshui jun Zhao(1). During the Tang, they lived in Jingzhao and held high office. During the disorder of the Five Dynasties, his ancestor, Zhao(1) B [20704], moved to Shaoxing, and his grandfather Xiang [360] moved to Quzhou, Xian xian. Yang(1)'s [402] brother, Ju's [7017] father, Qian's [351] uncle, Lin's [369] grandfather, Yi's [362] great grandfather, Xu(4) Ji(2)'s [780] grandfather-in-law. He recommended Xu(3) Jiusi [748] for his initial appointment to a capital fiscal bureau post. Pei [373] and Ting [393] have the same generational name as his grandsons and Pei's father, Jun [20954], the same generational name as his sons. His grandson-in-law, Mao(1) Pang [3672], is probably Mao(1) Jian's [1356] brother or cousin. XCB, 192.5b-6a, 17b, 201.1a; SHY:ZG, 44.35a; SHY:SH, 49.16b-17a; Su Shi, WJ, 'qianji,' 38.439; Wang Anshi, WJ, 50.524. CBD, 4, 3321-23.

desc.label: 與趙抃同邑相得，為山林之樂。
通判歙州 官至職方郎中知南康軍 與趙抃、司馬光、蘇軾交善
寓虢州盧氏 習辟穀術 趙抃復薦其行誼 賜號退安處士 治平未卒
